pkgmetadata.longdescription: Zen-Sources is a collaborative effort of kernel hackers and enthusiasts to include code that is not yet found in the mainline kernel in an attempt to support the latest hardware, new features, security fixes, optimizations, etc. This ebuild includes a hardened option. See http://www.zen-sources.org/ and http://www.gentoo.org/proj/en/hardened/primer.xml for more info.

use.flag: Adds PAX and grsec (hardened) patches for zen-sources.
